titles.title: Child Support Fairness and Tax Refund Interception Act of 2003
To expand the Federal tax refund intercept program to cover children who are not minors.
Child Support Fairness and Tax Refund Interception Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: Child Support Fairness and Tax Refund Interception Act of 2003 - Amends title IV part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of the Social Security Act to provide for the use of the tax refund intercept program to collect past-due child support on behalf of children who are not minors.
